title: Baz Aldrin tweeting: We are all in danger; it is evil itself.
subtitle: The site of a conspiracy claimed that the astronaut wrote - and then deleted - a terrible warning that humanity was at "risk" from the "Satan himself" in Antarctica.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The astronaut Paz Aldrin sent a tweet alleging that humanity is in danger and that the vague word is "the devil himself."
